title: Korea — Seoul to Sokcho
description: A journey through Seoul's vibrant streets, the dramatic east coast, and the historic Korean border. From urban exploration to coastal serenity.

title: Tokyo — Winter 2024
description: A winter in Tokyo, weaving though busy Shibuya, Shinjuku, and the quiet streets of Harajuku, along with peaceful escapes like Yoyogi Park and Shinjuku Gyoen.
